abstract: Westlands Water District, nation's largest irrigation district, reaches tentative agreement with Department of the Interior and federal government to clean up water contaminated by salt in California's Central Valley.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s largest irrigation district agreed to clean up contaminated water in California’s Central Valley in a tentative deal announced Tuesday.

headline.main: California: Tentative Cleanup Deal Is Reached Over Salt-Tainted Water
headline.print_headline: California: Tentative Cleanup Deal Is Reached Over Salt-Tainted Water

snippet: The nation’s largest irrigation district agreed to clean up contaminated water in California’s Central Valley in a tentative deal announced Tuesday.
